description: A dashboard to view pod metrics by namespace and pod names.

targets.expr: sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod!="", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"}[5m]))

sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"})

panels.title: Sum of CPU usage and requests

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod!="", pod=~"[[pod_name]]", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"})

sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]",  pod=~"[[pod_name]]", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"})

sum by (node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod!="", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"}[5m]))

panels.title: CPU usage (5 minutes average) per node

targets.expr: sum by (node) (cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"})

panels.title: Ratio of CPU usage (5 minutes average) and requests

panels.description: Click on a specific point to open dedicated Pod dashboard

targets.expr: rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod=~"[[pod_name]]", pod!="", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"}[5m])

panels.title: CPU per container (5 minutes average)

targets.expr:
sum (irate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ pod=~"[[pod_name]].*", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]",namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]"}[5m]))
/
sum (irate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{ pod=~"[[pod_name]].*", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]"}[5m]))

container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"[[pod_name]].*", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod!="", container!="POD", container!=""}

irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"[[pod_name]]", namespace=~"[[namespace]]", cluster=~"[[cluster]]", node=~"[[node_name]]", image!="", pod!="", container!="POD", container!="", container=~"[[container_name]]"}[5m])

panels.title: Network RX (ignoring container selector) (5 minutes average)
Network TX (ignoring container selector) (5 minutes average)

title: Pods (Aggregated view)
